name: cine-vision
description: Cine Vision - Netflix-like streaming platform with Telegram integration

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix admin" "npm run dev --prefix bot"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix backend && npm run build --prefix admin && npm run build --prefix bot
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:prod --prefix backend" "npm run start --prefix admin" "npm run start --prefix bot"
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix backend && npm run lint --prefix admin && npm run lint --prefix bot
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix backend && npm run test --prefix bot
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix admin && npm install --prefix bot
scripts.clean: npm run clean --prefix backend && npm run clean --prefix admin && npm run clean --prefix bot

author: Cine Vision Team
